name: Play Your Cards Right...
description:
With the theme "Merge two dissimilar game genres", we decided to make a Dating Sim + a Card Game. In this game, you do various activities to earn new cards to potentially woo 5 different partners. 

Be sure to try different cards on everyone to figure out what they do and don't like. Also! The characters follow a schedule, so they will show up at different locations at different times! Be sure to look around and try to figure out when you can encounter them!
